original_title: The Strange Case of Dr. Meade
overview: In this drama, a New York physician takes a much-needed vacation down South. Unfortunately, he encounters a nurse working in the backwoods and ends up helping her to combat an epidemic that rages through the mountain communities. The doctor she works for prefers traditional herbs to modern medicine.
tagline: ONE MAN'S COURAGE...AGAINST THE FURY OF THOUSANDS!
title: The Strange Case of Dr. Meade
